name: Arco Design Pro 2.0 设计资源
description:
🌈Arco Pro 2.0 设计资源全新上线

Arco Design 是由字节跳动 GIP UED 团队 和 架构前端团队联合推出的企业级设计系统。

中后台最佳实践官方模板Pro 2. 0正式上线，此版本更新了Arco 官方的中后台典型页面，包含工作台、列表、数据可视化、详情页等20+主要场景页面，设计风格也做了创新升级，React 及Vue 两种前端框架开箱即用。欢迎设计师同学使用新版 Pro 并提出宝贵的建议~

大家快来体验吧~

🌈 用法

$ npm i @arco-design/arco-cli@latest yarn -g
$ arco init my-project

🌈 官网链接

Arco：https://arco.design

Pro：https://pro.arco.design

Github：https://github.com/arco-design

🌈 公众号

Arco Design


---------------------------------------------------------

🌈 Intro

Arco Design is an enterprise-level Design system jointly launched by Bytedance's GIP UED team and the architecture front end team.

The official template Pro 2.0 for Best Practices in the Middle and background has been launched. This version updates the typical pages of the official middle and background of Arco, including 20+ main scene pages, such as workbench, list, data visualization, and detail pages. The design style has also been updated, React and Vue front-end frameworks are ready to use out of the box. Welcome to use the new Pro, we look forward to your valuable suggestions.

Come and experience it!

🌈 Usage

$ npm i @arco-design/arco-cli@latest yarn -g
$ arco init my-project

🌈 Website

Arco：https://arco.design

Pro：https://pro.arco.design

Github：https://github.com/arco-design

🌈 WeChat Official Account

Arco Design
